item.title: A Descriptive Analysis of Airbnb accomodations in Bologna
item.description: Language used: R Database used: “listing.csv” from the website http://insideairbnb.com/get-the-data/ composed by a mix of 18 qualitative and quantitative variables and 3896 cases. Packages used: dplyr: to obtain a general descriptive analysis of the data. ggplot2: to create graphs ggmap: to be able to show maps RColorBrewer: to assign colors to the heatmap visualization osmdata: to obtain the geographic coordinates of the city of Bologna hrbrthemes: to obtain more ggplot themes Variables description:
